newsitem.title: USA: Objective Systems sees Q3 loss.
newsitem.headline: Objective Systems sees Q3 loss.

text.p: Objective Systems Integrators said Monday it expects to post a loss of between $0.16 and $0.18 a share on revenues of about $10 million.
The company earned $0.06 a share on revenues of $13.8 million in the comparable year-ago quarter.

The company said the lower projected revenues related to a near-term slowing in the competitive local exchange carrier market due to a delay in implementation of deregulation in the local loop and near-term slowing in the personal communications system market related to the large investments required for the licenses, which in some cases has delayed the buildout in infrastructure.
The company said in a statement it also had delays in finalizing some of its customer contracts prior to the end of the third quarter.
